abilities.name: Soul Amphorae
abilities.description: In your hero phase, you can heal D3 wounds allocated to each Sylvaneth model within 30" of this model. Once per battle, in your hero phase, instead of using this ability to heal, you can summon 1 unit from the list below to the battlefield, and add it to your army. The summoned unit must be set up wholly within 9" of this model and more than 9" from any enemy units. That unit cannot move in the following movement phase. Choose a unit from the following list: 20 Dryads, 10 Tree-Revenants, 10 Spite-Revenants, 3 Kurnoth Hunters, 1 Branchwych, 1 Treelord.

abilities.name: Lifebloom
abilities.description: In each of your hero phases, Alarielle heals D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Living Battering Ram
abilities.description: If this model ends a charge move within 1" of a terrain feature, each other unit within or on that terrain feature suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Talon of the Dwindling
abilities.description: At the end of the combat phase, roll two dice for each model that suffered wounds from the Talon of the Dwindling but was not slain. If the result exceeds the model’s Wounds characteristic, or if you roll two sixes, the model is slain.

abilities.name: Sweeping Blows
abilities.description: When the Wardroth Beetle attacks with its Great Antlers, you can add 1 to the hit rolls if the target unit has five or more models.

command_ability.name: Ghyran's Wrath
command_ability.description: Alarielle can use this ability once per battle. When she does so, you can re-roll all failed wound rolls made for friendly Sylvaneth models until your next hero phase.

magic.name: Metamorphosis
magic.description: Metamorphosis has a casting value of 5. If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 16" and roll a number of dice equal to the result of the casting roll (e.g. if the casting roll was 6, roll 6 dice). For each result of 4 or more, the unit suffers a mortal wound. If the last model in the unit is slain, you can set up a Sylvaneth Wyldwood in its place. None of the woods can be set up within 1" of any other models or terrain features.

magic.name: The Reaping
magic.description: All enemy units w/n 3" suffer D3 mortal wounds.

magic.name: Soulsnare Shackles
magic.description: Set up first shackle wholly w/n 12" of the caster, then set up the second and third models wholly w/n 6" if the first. At the start of the movement phase roll a dice for each unit w/n 6" of any soulsnare shackle model. On a 3+ halve the move characteristic of that unit until the end of that phase. On a 6 that unit also suffers D3 mortal wounds.

phases.name: Ghyran's Wrath
phases.description: Alarielle can use this ability once per battle. When she does so, you can re-roll all failed wound rolls made for friendly Sylvaneth models until your next hero phase.

Once per battle, in your hero phase, instead of using this ability to heal, you can summon 1 unit from the list below to the battlefield, and add it to your army. The summoned unit must be set up wholly within 9" of this model and more than 9" from any enemy units. That unit cannot move in the following movement phase. Choose a unit from the following list: 20 Dryads, 10 Tree-Revenants, 10 Spite-Revenants, 3 Kurnoth Hunters, 1 Branchwych, 1 Treelord

phases.name: Lifebloom
phases.description: In each of your hero phases, Alarielle heals D3 wounds.

phases.name: Talon of the Dwindling
phases.description: At the end of the combat phase, roll two dice for each model that suffered wounds from the Talon of the Dwindling but was not slain. If the result exceeds the model’s Wounds characteristic, or if you roll two sixes, the model is slain.

phases.name: Sweeping Blows
phases.description: When the Wardroth Beetle attacks with its Great Antlers, you can add 1 to the hit rolls if the target unit has five or more models.

abilities.name: Silent Communion
abilities.description: In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly Treelord Ancient and roll a dice. On a 4+, you can set up 1 Sylvaneth Wyldwood terrain feature wholly within 24" of that Treelord Ancient, and more than 3" from any other models or terrain features.

abilities.name: Spirit Paths
abilities.description: If a Treelord Ancient is within 3" of a Sylvaneth Wyldwood at the start of your movement phase, he can travel along the spirit paths. If he does so, remove the Spirit of Durthu from the battlefield, and then set him up within 3" of a different Sylvaneth Wyldwood, more than 9" from any enemy models. This is his move for the movement phase

abilities.name: Groundshaking Stomp
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, the Spirit of Durthu stomps the ground; roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this model. On a roll of 4 or more, that unit is knocked off their feet by the impact and must subtract 1 from all hit rolls in that combat phase as they regain their footing.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: If the Treelord Ancient’s Massive Impaling Talons inflict a wound on an enemy model, roll a dice. If the result exceeds the number of wounds the enemy model has remaining, it is slain.You can re-roll hit and wound rolls of 1 for Brokk Grungsson if those attacks are directed against a Hero or Monster.If the Spirit of Durthu’s Massive Impaling Talons inflict a wound on an enemy model, roll a dice. If the result exceeds the number of wounds the enemy model has remaining, it is slain.

command_ability.name: Heed the Spirit Song
command_ability.description: The Treelord Ancient speaks to its kin through the spirit-song, warning them of approaching dangers. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll save rolls of 1 for Sylvaneth units if they are within 10" of the Treelord Ancient.

magic.name: Awakening the Wood
magic.description: Awakening the Wood has a casting value of 6. If successfully cast, pick a Sylvaneth Wyldwood that is within 24" of the caster. Each enemy unit within 3" of this Sylvaneth Wyldwood suffers D3 mortal wounds.

magic.name: Regrowth
magic.description: Pick a unit w/n 18" heal D3 wounds. If Sylvaneth heal D6.

magic.name: Soulsnare Shackles
magic.description: Set up first shackle wholly w/n 12" of the caster, then set up the second and third models wholly w/n 6" if the first. At the start of the movement phase roll a dice for each unit w/n 6" of any soulsnare shackle model. On a 3+ halve the move characteristic of that unit until the end of that phase. On a 6 that unit also suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Solemn Guardian
abilities.description: If an attack that targets a friendly Sylvaneth Hero w/n 6" of a Spirit of Durthu causes a wound, roll a dice. On a 4+ the wound is inflicted on Durthu. (Roll save as normal)

abilities.name: Verdant Blast
abilities.description: Add 2 to the weapon's attack characteristic for the rest of the turn. Take D3 mortal wounds at the end of the Shooting Phase.

abilities.name: Guardian Sword
abilities.description: Extra D3 attacks with the Guardian Sword if he is w/n 3" of a Wyldwood when he attacks in the combat phase

abilities.name: Groundshaking Stomp
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, the Treelord stomps the ground; roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this model. On a roll of 4 or more, that unit is knocked off their feet by the impact and must subtract 1 from all hit rolls in that combat phase as they regain their footing.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: If the Treelords Massive Impaling Talons inflict a wound on an enemy model, roll a dice. If the result exceeds the number of wounds the enemy model has remaining, it is slain.

abilities.name: Champions of the Everqueen's Will
abilities.description: All friendly Sylvaneth units w/n 8" of any Durthus in the battleshock phase add 1 to bravery.

command_trait.name: Gnarled Warrior
command_trait.description: Ignore rend unless it is -2 or greater.

artefact.name: Briarsheath
artefact.description: Subtract 1 from all hit rolls made against the bearer.

phases.name: Spirit Paths
phases.description: If a Spirit of Durthu is within 3" of a Sylvaneth Wyldwood at the start of your movement phase, he can travel along the spirit paths. If they do so, remove the Spirit of Durthu from the battlefield, and then set him up within 3" of a different Sylvaneth Wyldwood, more than 9" from any enemy models. This is their move for the movement phase

phases.name: Solemn Guardian
phases.description: If an attack that targets a friendly Sylvaneth Hero within 6" of a Spirit of Durthu causes a wound, roll a dice. On a result of 4 or more the wound is inflicted on the Spirit of Durthu instead(You can make a save roll as normal).

phases.name: Gnarled Warrior
phases.description: Ignore rend unless it is -2 or higher.

phases.name: Briarsheath
phases.description: Bearer is -1 to hit.

phases.name: Verdant Blast
phases.description: When a Spirit of Durthu attacks with a Verdant Blast, you can declare that he will channel his life force to intensify its power. Add 2 to the weapon's Attacks for the rest of the turn. If the Spirit of Durthu uses this Ability, he suffers D3 mortal wounds at the end of the shooting phase.

phases.description: Make and extra D3 attacks with the Guardian Sword if he is within 3" of a Sylvaneth Wyldwood when he attacks in the combat phase.

phases.description: Spirit of Durthu instil courage in the Everqueen's children. All friendly Sylvaneth units that are within 8" of any Spirits of Durthu in the battleshock phase add 1 to their bravery

abilities.name: Mercurial Aspect
abilities.description: At the start of each battle round, roll a dice. 1,2,3 Drycha is enraged. 4,5,6 Drycha is embittered.

abilities.name: Enraged
abilities.description: Double the number of attacks with Drycha's Slashing Talon's. Reroll 1's for Colony of Flitterfuries

abilities.name: Embittered
abilities.description: Subtract 2 from Drycha's wound table. Reroll 1's for Squirmlings.

abilities.name: Colony of Flitterfuries
abilities.description: Roll 10 dice for each enemy unit w/n 18"(0-2), 15"(3-4), 12"(5-7), 9"(8-9), 6"(10+). For each roll of 6, that unit suffers a mortal wound.

abilities.name: Song of Spite
abilities.description: Reroll wound rolls of 1 for Spite Revenants while their unit is w/n 10" of Drycha.

magic.name: Primal Terror
magic.description: Roll a dice for each enemy unit w/n 10" of the caster, adding 2 to the result. For each point by which the total exceeds the highest bravery in that unit, the unit suffers a mortal wound.

magic.name: Verdant Blessing
magic.description: Set up a new Wyldwood anywhere w/n 18" of the caster that is not w/n 1" of any other model or terrain feature.

phases.name: Mercurial Aspect
phases.description: At the start of each battle round, roll a dice. 1,2,3 Drycha is enraged. 4,5,6 Drycha is embittered.

phases.name: Primal Terror
phases.description: Roll a dice for each enemy unit w/n 10" of the caster, adding 2 to the result. For each point by which the total exceeds the highest bravery in that unit, the unit suffers a mortal wound.

phases.name: Colony of Flitterfuries
phases.description: Roll 10 dice for each enemy unit w/n 18"(0-2), 15"(3-4), 12"(5-7), 9"(8-9), 6"(10+). For each roll of 6, that unit suffers a mortal wound.

abilities.name: Envoys of the Everqueen
abilities.description: If a friendly Sylvaneth hero uses a command ability, you can measure the range of that command ability from a friendly Kurnoth Hunters unit instead of the hero.

abilities.name: Tanglethorn Thicket
abilities.description: At the start of either players charge phase, Kurnoth Hunters can declare that they can't pile in more than 1" but they can reroll failed save rolls.

abilities.name: Huntmaster
abilities.description: The leader of this unit is a Huntmaster. Add 1 to the result of any hit rolls fot a Huntmasters attack.

abilities.name: Trample Underfoot
abilities.description: At the end of the combat phase, pick an enemy unit and roll a dice for each Kurnoth Hunter from this unit that is w/n 1" of it. For each result of 4+, the enemy unit suffers a mortal wound.

phases.name: Envoys of the Everqueen
phases.description: If a friendly Sylvaneth hero uses a command ability, you can measure the range of that command ability from a friendly Kurnoth Hunters unit instead of the hero.

phases.description: At the start of either players charge phase, Kurnoth Hunters can declare that they can't pile in more than 1" but they can reroll failed save rolls.

phases.name: huntmaster
phases.description: The leader of this unit is a Huntmaster. Add 1 to the result of any hit rolls fot a Huntmasters attack.

phases.name: Trample Underfoot
phases.description: At the end of the combat phase, pick an enemy unit and roll a dice for each Kurnoth Hunter from this unit that is w/n 1" of it. For each result of 4+, the enemy unit suffers a mortal wound.

abilities.name: Blessings of the Forest
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from hit rolls made against this unit if it is w/n 3" of a Wyldwood.

abilities.name: Impenatrable Thicket
abilities.description: You can add 1 to save rolls for this unit if it includes at least 12 models.

abilities.name: Branch Nymph
abilities.description: The leader of this unit is a Branch Nymph, she makes 3 attacks rather than 2.

abilities.name: Enrapturing Song
abilities.description: In your own combat phase, you can enrapture one enemy unit that is w/n 3" of this unit. You can add 1 to the hit rolls made for these Dryads against the enraptured unit in that combat phase.

phases.name: Impenatrable Thicket
phases.description: You can add 1 to save rolls for this unit if it includes at least 12 models.

phases.name: Blessings of the Forest
phases.description: Subtract 1 from hit rolls made against this unit if it is w/n 3" of a Wyldwood.

phases.name: Enrapturing Song
phases.description: In your own combat phase, you can enrapture one enemy unit that is w/n 3" of this unit. You can add 1 to the hit rolls made for these Dryads against the enraptured unit in that combat phase.

phases.name: Branch Nymph
phases.description: The leader of this unit is a Branch Nymph, she makes 3 attacks rather than 2.

abilities.name: Shadestalker
abilities.description: The leader of this unit is a Shadestalker, she makes 4 attacks rather than 3.

abilities.name: Unbridled Malice
abilities.description: Enemy units w/n 3" of any Spite Revenants must subtract 1 from their bravery.

abilities.name: Whispers in the dark
abilities.description: Scenery w/n 8" of any Spite Revenants is haunted. You opponents must roll 2 dice when taking battleshock tests for any of their units that are w/n 3" of such a terrain feature, and use the highest dice result.

phases.name: Shadestalker
phases.description: The leader of this unit is a Shadestalker, she makes 4 attacks rather than 3.

phases.description: Enemy units w/n 3" of any Spite Revenants must subtract 1 from their bravery.
